divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work when on my street my car turned its self off a bright flash of light then looking up I saw a red triangle of lights shoot off at a fast rate and the car turned back on 15 min later you could hear what sounded like wind and gears turning in the middle of the woods.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Fraser
There were no other sightings in Fraser on or around March 25th 2011
Summary: flash of light triangle of red lights
